events.message: Customer filed a claim after a collision involving their car on the downtown highway at rush hour.
Claim was categorised under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and damage description.
An agent was assigned to manage the case and coordinate further communications with the claimant.
Acknowledgement email sent to the customer confirming receipt of the claim and next steps.
Requested photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and repair estimates from the claimant.
Customer submitted all requested documents including accident photos and official police documentation.
Investigation initiated to verify claim details, damages, and liability based on submitted evidence.
Investigation completed confirming accident circumstances and validating the claimant’s responsibility.
A settlement offer was proposed covering repair costs and deductible based on appraisal results.
Customer provided positive feedback appreciating the prompt handling and clarity of the proposal.
Claim approved following acceptance of the settlement offer by the customer without dispute.
Payment was issued to the repair shop and customer’s deductible was processed accordingly.
The claim was formally closed after successful repair confirmation and final customer satisfaction.
All claim documents and communication files were archived into secure storage for future reference.
